# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c52e-102">Outlook.com 設定のオプションを確認する方法</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c52e-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c52e-103">ページの上部で、歯車のアイコンを選択し、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c52e-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon.</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="2c52e-104">[設定] を開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c52e-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c52e-105">[設定] ウィンドウの下部で、[[**Outlook のすべての設定を表示**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage)] を選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c52e-105">At the top of the page, select the gear icon to open Settings. At the bottom of the Settings pane, select **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c52e-106">全般、メール、予定表、(該当する場合は) プレミアムの設定とオプションが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c52e-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
